user.title: Connect to Ghost
user.description: Enter your Ghost site URL and Admin API key. You can find your Admin API key in Ghost Admin under Settings → Integrations → Add custom integration.

data_description.url: The URL of your Ghost site (e.g., https://example.com)
data_description.admin_api_key: Your Admin API key in the format id:secret

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Ghost. Please check your URL and API key.
error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key format. The key should be in the format id:secret.

abort.already_configured: This Ghost site is already configured.
